short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Integrate DigiQSL with logging platforms such as QRZ.com

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The digiQSL Integration Chrome Extension makes it easy for amateur radio operators using QRZ.com to log and send digital QSL Conformation Cards using DigiQSL.com.
When you log a contact in your QRZ logbook, this extension adds a "Send QSL" button to the page. Clicking this button collects QSO details such as callsign, date, time, band, mode, and signal reports to help fill the QSL Confirmation card in a one-click process. This data is sent to DigiQSL.com, where you can customize and send your digital QSL Confirmation card to your contact.
We hope that the digiQSL Integration extension provides a smooth and efficient logging experience for amateur radio operators.
